glsa.title: UnZip: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in UnZip, the worst of which could lead to code execution.

background.p: Info-ZIPâ€™s UnZip is a tool to list and extract files inside PKZIP compressed files.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in UnZip. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All UnZip users should upgrade to the latest version:
